summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by updating OKLCH theme tokens in `frontend/src/index.css` for both `:root` and `.dark`, keeping `body` styled via `@apply bg-background text-foreground`, and adjusting dependent tokens (foreground/card/popover/etc.) for readability. Two additional non-requested metadata/documentation files were modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated metadata/documentation summaries describing the new bright red theme.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to change global theme tokens in `frontend/src/index.css`; it did not request updating repo summary/metadata files.
